CREATE TABLE Staff( StaffID varchar(10) not null, FirstName varchar(25), LastName varchar(25), NIC varchar(15), Address varchar(500), Email varchar(100), AccNo varchar(25), Password varchar(15), StaffType varchar(25), ContractYears int, BasicSalary double, OTRate double,
primary key (StaffID) )
insert into staff (StaffID, FirstName, LastName, NIC, Address, Email, AccNo, Password, StaffType, ContractYears, BasicSalary, OTRate) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

update staff as s set s.FirstName = ?, s.LastName = ?, s.NIC = ?, s.Address = ?, s.Email = ?, s.AccNo = ?, s.Password = ?, s.StaffType = ?, s.ContractYears = ?, s.BasicSalary = ?, s.OTRate = ? where s.StaffID = ?
select s.StaffID from staff as s
